text: Need Rowan Bailey for Hungry Jack's campaign. Budget around $12,562, looking for 2 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Instagram reel, 2 x Pinterest pin, 3 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x Article contribution. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
